statements: SELECT * FROM blog_posts;
SELECT post_title, author_name FROM blog_posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_title, publish_date FROM blog_posts WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM blog_posts WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM blog_posts GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM blog_posts WHERE author_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT post_title, author_name FROM blog_posts WHERE post_id > 10;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM blog_posts WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' AND publish_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM blog_posts GROUP BY author_name HAVING post_count > 5;
SELECT post_id, post_title, publish_date FROM blog_posts WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM blog_posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM blog_posts WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM blog_posts WHERE author_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive' AND analysis_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT post_title, post_content, post_date, author_id FROM blog_posts WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_title, post_date, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM blog_posts JOIN sentiment_analysis ON blog_posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT post_id, post_title, sentiment_score FROM blog_posts JOIN sentiment_analysis ON blog_posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT author_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_sentiment FROM blog_posts JOIN sentiment_analysis ON blog_posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id GROUP BY author_id HAVING average_sentiment > 0.7 ORDER BY average_sentiment DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM blog_posts;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT post_title, sentiment_score FROM blog_posts ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blog_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM blog_posts WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT post_title, COUNT(comment_id) AS num_comments FROM blog_posts LEFT JOIN comments ON blog_posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY blog_posts.post_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT post_title, comment_text, sentiment_score FROM blog_posts INNER JOIN comments ON blog_posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE comment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM blog_posts;
SELECT post_content, author_name FROM blog_posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content, author_name, post_date FROM blog_posts WHERE author_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, author_name, post_date FROM blog_posts WHERE author_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE comment_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM blog_posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content, author_name FROM blog_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT sentiment_label, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT insight_id, market_trend, insight_date FROM market_insights WHERE insight_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text FROM comments ORDER BY comment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blog_posts;
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM blog_posts WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM blog_posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT post_title, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM blog_posts JOIN post_sentiments ON blog_posts.post_id = post_sentiments.post_id;
SELECT * FROM blog_posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM blog_posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_title, author_name FROM blog_posts JOIN authors ON blog_posts.author_id = authors.author_id;
SELECT post_title, sentiment_score FROM blog_posts JOIN post_sentiments ON blog_posts.post_id = post_sentiments.post_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_title, COUNT(comment_id) AS comment_count FROM blog_posts LEFT JOIN comments ON blog_posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY blog_posts.post_id;
